node.html:
I'm an Ireland based Cloud Computing enthusiast, who has worked on several technologies for the last four years. Independent and self-motivated, with a track record of learning new technologies rapidly and going the additional mile to help others.

Completed my final semester of Masters in Cloud Computing from National College of Ireland. Apart from studies, I am writing technical blogs on my own website YouCompetent.

Hello everyone! I am a technology enthusiast doing a Masters in Cloud Computing at the National College of Ireland, Dublin, Ireland. Prior to that, I spent three years as a Technology Integration Engineer at Amdocs, India. Additionally, I am working at SAP, Ireland, to support my masters' studies. I can claim that in my first year at Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai, where I did my Bachelors in Computer Engineering, I was introduced to intermediate level programming (2014-2018).

As a Cloud Computing student, I now have extensive experience with most AWS services, where I used to design web apps and deploy them on cloud deployment providers such as Elastic Beanstalk, CodeDeploy, and AWS Lambda. More interestingly, I have completed my thesis, which is titled "Benchmarking of Serverless and Real-Time Inferencing and Performance Analysis of CPU/GPU Instances for Deep Learning Workloads." In this research, I propose a technique and architecture Using AWS SageMaker, AWS Lambda endpoints, a GPU-based instance endpoints, and S3 to analyze the model performance, inference performance for both serverless & real-time instances, and cost advantages over multiple Machine Learning GPU-instance types depending on the payload.

I'm also a Tech Blogger where I share the knowledge of the technologies I am familiar with and provide the resources too.

Here is a list of the technologies that I'm familiar with!

• Ensuring the IT Incidents and Service Requests are resolved within a given SLA. Resolving 20+ trouble tickets per day through efficient triaging of problems.

  • Applying solutions, workarounds, patches and fixes. Error handling, monitoring, and logging with the help of Splunk tool.

  • Maintaining 99% satisfaction rating in monthly end-user scoring through applied interpersonal skills and providing fast solutions.

  • First point of contact for SAP customers on SAP Community Network application.

  • Highlighting all potential major incidents and problems to the respective service and problem managers.

• Focused on automation, containerization, integration monitoring, and configuration management.

  • Developed and implemented software release management strategies for various applications according to the agile process.

  • Kubernetes is being used to orchestrate the deployment, scaling, and management of Docker containers. Created pods and managed using Kubernetes.

  • Actively worked on Docker and deploying and maintaining microservices in QA and Dev environments.

  • Created Ansible playbooks to deploy Virtual Machines and install the components as per requirements.

  • Applied scripting knowledge to automate the deployment and find out the number of configuration mistakes easily, kept an eye on every server for utilization, and improve time complexity.

  • Experienced in BOT Automation, operated for configuration and validation purposes, as a reason the team does not need to do the configuration and validations manually.

  • Configured cluster, failover cluster, troubleshoot cluster issues, add/delete resources, and service groups.

  • Provided support to the numerous applications at the same time to maintain all the applications keep running without any problems and ensure health.

  • Built the non-productive and production-like environments likewise configured to the latest versions.

  • Setup elastic load balancers for distributed traffic and applied emergency fixes among multiple WebLogic servers.

  • Managed the entire release communication and release coordination during the project roll-out.

frontmatter.title: 3AK Pharma : An Integrated Cloud Based HealthCare Solution

node.html: The web application makes use of a publicly available REST-API named Auth0 for authentication and self-developed API foraccess management. We have deployed our web application on Amazon Web services AWS Beanstalk platform and have also provisioned a full life-cycle CICD pipeline for the purpose of quick delivery and deployment of changes.

frontmatter.title: SARS-CoV-2 Pandemic Analysis and Prediction using Cloud based Machine Learning Models

node.html: we have implemented a time series forecasting Projection which makes scientific predictions based on historical time stamped data. We have devised a number of algorithms like Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), Prophet Model, Pattern Evaluation to accurately forecast the future of the pandemic. The project displays the data in form of graphs and charts making it more meaningful and understandable. This information is of essential importance for pandemic planning and mitigation strategies.

frontmatter.title: Stock Investment Tool for Cloud Platform Programming

node.html: In this project we have not used any API to get the market data, instead, we created a few random stocks and functionally act as an actual stock market. This will guide the beginner or an investor to jump into the stock market and analyze their profits and losses. This web application is a simulation of the trading activity, where the graph of the share is viewable. Also, after successful buying and selling of the stock, usersâ€™ holdings would be updated accordingly in graphical format. Because of this, the user can analyze the performance of his trading activity in a share market simulation.

The ERC20 compliant ethereum token is generated consisting of 1 million tokens, the same token having 18 decimal places, also the token having a given name and the description. The distribution of the 5% of the total 1 million supply of the token is made to the 10 accounts through the Ropsten test net network.
My inbox is never closed. Whether you have a question or simply want to say hi, I will do my best to respond! Please notify me of any relevant job updates.
